trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a promotion fails.
trans-unit.target: 승격에 실패 한 경우 throw 되는 예외입니다.

trans-unit.source: This exception should be thrown by an implementation of <xref:System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification> interface to indicate that a call to <xref:System.Transactions.ITransactionPromoter.Promote%2A> has failed.
trans-unit.target: 구현에 따라이 예외를 throw 해야 <xref:System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification>임을 나타내는 인터페이스에 대 한 호출 <xref:System.Transactions.ITransactionPromoter.Promote%2A>실패 했습니다.</xref:System.Transactions.ITransactionPromoter.Promote%2A> </xref:System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification>

trans-unit.source: If an implementation of <xref:System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification> fails a promotion due to an exception that is not fatal, it should catch that exception and create a TransactionPromotionException with the original exception as the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 구현이 <xref:System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification>해당 예외를 catch 하 고 작업을 내부 예외로 원래 예외를 사용 하 여 한 TransactionPromotionException 만들기 심각 하지 않은 예외로 인해 수준 올리기에 실패 합니다.</xref:System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException"></xref> class with the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException"> </xref> 지정 된 메시지 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains a message that explains why the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>예외가 발생 한 이유를 설명 하는 메시지를 포함 하는.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException"></xref> class with the specified serialization and streaming context information.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException"> </xref> 지정한 직렬화 된 및 스트리밍 컨텍스트 정보입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that describes a failed serialization.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> 실패 한 serialization을 설명 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that describes a failed serialization context.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> 실패 한 serialization 컨텍스트를 설명 하는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException"></xref> class with the specified message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Transactions.TransactionPromotionException"> </xref> 된 지정 된 메시지와 내부 예외를 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains a message that explains why the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>예외가 발생 한 이유를 설명 하는 메시지를 포함 하는.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception instance that causes the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 현재 예외를 발생 시킨 예외 인스턴스를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException*> property.
